plot: When a workaholic father is forced to take his family with him on a business trip, he finally learns what is most important in his life.
title: Cabo Bob
plot_es: When a workaholic father is forced to take his family with him on a business trip, he finally learns what is most important in his life.
plot_en: When a workaholic father is forced to take his family with him on a business trip, he finally learns what is most important in his life.
